p: Molecular docking is a tool to predict the binding interaction of ligands towards targeted proteins as well as giving the binding affinity of small compounds [ 44]. In order to confirm the in vitro results and to find out potential residues towards the active site of targeted enzyme, the ligandâ€“enzyme binding interactions between CA active compounds and the AChE enzyme were evaluated using AutoDock 4.2 [ 45]. The results of the estimated binding interaction energies with the active site of AChE are presented in Table 5.
